content: भाषा [भास्-अ] {@--1@} Speech, talk; as in चारुभाषः. {@--2@} Language, tongue; <ls>Ms. 8. 164.</ls> {@--3@} A common or vernacular dialect; ({%a%}) the {%spoken%} Sanskrit language (opp छंदस् or वेद); विभाषा भाषायां <ls>P. VI. 1. 181</ls>; ({%b%}) any Prākṛta dialect (<ab>opp.</ab> संस्कृत); <ls>Ms. 9. 332.</ls> {@--4@} Definition, description; स्थितप्रज्ञस्य का भाषा <ls>Bg. 2. 54.</ls> {@--5@} An epithet of Sarasvatī, the goddess of speech. {@--6@} (In law) The first of the four stages of a law-suit; the plaint, charge or accusation.
